title: Opulent Egypt Oasis Overlooking the Red Sea with Outdoor Pools & Six Dining Venues
description:
Imagine waking up in your own slice of Egypt paradise, where luxury isn't just a word, it's a lifestyle. From the moment you arrive, opulence and contemporary design set the foundations for an unforgettable stay. When hunger strikes, explore any of the six restaurants from Brazilian-inspired La Churrascaria to Turkish-style Lalezar. Be sure to visit the Anjana Spa for a massage that will leave you on cloud nine.

Situated on the shores of sapphire-blue waters, the resort's Surf and Diving Club is your ticket to exploring the Red Sea's underwater world of spectacular coral reefs. As the true heart of Hurghada, El Dahar Old Town is the go-to spot for the city's most authentic restaurants, you can't leave without trying koshari, Egypt's beloved street food.
